definition: to leak (gas)/to be discouraged/to despair/(disparaging) pathetic/to vent one's anger/(of a tire) to be flat
to leak (of water or gas)/to drip/to drain/to discharge/to leak out/to divulge (secrets)/to give vent (to anger, spite etc)/to disperse/to reduce
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.english: Provided (that) we don't lose heart, we'll succeed in the experiment.
sentences.chinese: 只要我们不泄气，我们就会取得试验的成功。

sentences.english: I'm frustrated that I can't concentrate on my homework.
sentences.chinese: 我没法把注意力集中在我的作业上，真令人泄气。

sentences.english: We won't be discouraged even if(=even though) we fail ten times.
sentences.chinese: 我们就是失败十次也不泄气。

sentences.english: Jade sentimental hand can not run out, the king of the glass cup.
sentences.chinese: 玉多情手不了侮辱跑了出去，金常务摔掉杯子泄气。
进展慢腾腾得叫人泄气。

sentences.english: I'm frustrated that I can't lose weight.
sentences.chinese: 我一点也减不下来，真让人泄气。

sentences.english: One sharp remark is enough to deflate her.
sentences.chinese: 一句尖锐的话足以使她泄气。

sentences.english: If the mission is so big that it disempowers you, dump it.
sentences.chinese: 要是这个目标太大让你泄气，那就放弃这个目标。

sentences.english: Never get discouraged when you lose awareness.
sentences.chinese: 当你失去觉知时，永远不要泄气。

sentences.english: Ales saw a woman with a flat tire and gave her a hand with it.
sentences.chinese: 阿力克斯见一妇女轮胎泄气便帮她换胎。

sentences.english: No wonder I was feeling uninspired.
Even if you get demoralized, don't give up.
sentences.chinese: 即使是你感到泄气，也千万不要放弃。

sentences.english: You must not despond if your plans do not succeed.
sentences.chinese: 即使计划没有成功，你也不该泄气。

sentences.english: To his dismay, there were hundreds of people ahead of him in line to see St. Peter.
sentences.chinese: 让他泄气的是，他前面有上百人在排队等着见圣彼得。

sentences.english: Don't get discouraged by what you don't understand.
sentences.chinese: 不要因为你听不明白的而泄气。

sentences.english: He remains frustrated by ABC's decision not to report the killing.
sentences.chinese: 他同样对美国广播公司决定不报道射杀事件感到泄气。

definition: sighing voice, wailing breath (idiom)/to heave deep sighs/to sigh in despair
variant of 憤憤不平|愤愤不平[fen4 fen4 bu4 ping2]
dispirited and downcast (idiom); listless/in low spirits/washed out
